properties.areaDesc: Lake Michigan from Seul Choix Point to Rock Island Passage 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan South of a line from Seul Choix Point to the Mackinac Bridge and North of a line from Charlevoix MI to South Fox Island 5NM offshore
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 8 at 2:39PM CST until January 9 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 kt shifting south. Gusts up to
35 kt and waves 7 to 12 feet expected.

* WHERE...Far northern Lake Michigan.

* WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM CST THURSDAY
